select t1.item,count(t2.cust_id) count from base_dict t1 left join cst_customer t2
on t1.item = t2.level
on t1.item = t2.credit
on t1.item = t2.satisfy
where t1.type=#{type} group by t1.item;
select count(DISTINCT t1.cust_id) from cst_customer t1,cst_order t2,order_item t3 where t1.cust_id=t2.cust_id and t2.odr_id=t3.order_id order by price desc
